item.description: Lets take over the outdoor tables on a covered patio or if it is too hot, the tables inside. The Citizen Wine Bar is one of the Niche Hospitality Restaurants that also own Bocado, Mezcal and The Jewel Box and they have a fun little menu with delicious food and great wine and beer. They also have the best chocolate mousse that I have ever tasted and a fun intimate atmosphere. Check it out at www.thecitizenwinebar.com. We will meet there at 6:30. Just ask for Sue and I will make sure the staff knows where to direct you. I am looking forward to meeting you!
item.name: Dinner at The Citizen Wine Bar in Exchange Place in Worcester
